job.title: Java Software Engineer
job.description: ltstronggtltugtDescriptionltbrgtltbrgtltugtltstronggtFlex Payroll is looking for a software engineer to join our energetic team This high performing group follows an Agile methodology working together to get through though challenges and allowing the team to succeed This full stack team works on a range of efforts within our Flex Client Facing application space Tasks are assigned requiring skills in design SQL Java JavaScript Incidents andor anything in between No worries if you are not an expert in everything we focus on growing bench strength in everyone so there are no silos or dependencies on SMEsltbrgtltulgtltligtAs an engineer you should know about full stack development in the web space This includes Oracle Java Javascript HTMLCSS along with webservices and OpenshiftltligtltligtWe are also using Angular but will be moving to REACT as an example that means adaptability is a must since change never stops in the Java and Web spaceltligtltligtOther technical areas involved are Mongo Kafka Openshift Webservices Splunk AppDynamics Appd GIT Intellij Jenkins ECS Mobile development and continuous deploymentsltligtltligtGreat communication leadership skills in mentoring and a team playerltligtltligtCreativity innovation and the ability to help with efforts in Continuous Delivery spaceltligtltligtOur developers participate in all levels of software development from high level tshirt estimating design documents reviews architecture reviews Release Planning active development and testing deployment and supportltligtltulgt ltstronggtRequirementsltbrgtltstronggtltulgtltligtBachelors Degree in Computerrelated discipline or equivalent work experienceltligtltligtExpertise in SQL JAVA and JavascriptltligtltligtBut most importantly be supportive and a role model of our Paychex ValuesltligtltligtIntegrity Service Innovation Partnership Accountable RespectltbrgtltligtltulgtltstronggtOur CommitmentltbrgtltbrgtltstronggtPaychex is dedicated to fostering a culture of intentional Inclusion and Diversity IampampD Our valued employees and commitment to IampampD is the essence of our internal and external success Inclusivity is a key value of our corporate culture and is exemplified through our reputation as a top employer for employee development diversity and ethics as well as a focus on fairness in recruitment selection and decision makingltbrgtltbrgtClick here for more information on our corporate social responsibility
